pages.text: Kitsunebi (Fox Fire) is an invisible light. Use it against a block for normal placement, or use it in the air to toss Kitsunebi and place it where it lands. $(br2) Feed the fox Aburaage to generate Kitunebi, and give other items to the fox to get the Kitsunebi from its mouth.$(br2)In order to use it, you need to have a Fire Element Magatama with 10 or more stored Reiryoku in your inventory.
Only when the Kitsunebi is held in the hand, flame particles appear at the locations of the nearby Kitsunebi to confirm the positions of the Kitsunebi.
